heading: Monday
text: Cold. Mostly cloudy, partial clearing this afternoon.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. winds dropping to less than 5 mph
temperature: Mid to upper teens, near 20 south

heading: Tuesday
text: Mostly cloudy. Chance of snow showers north.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy. Afternoon showers in the St. Lawrence Valley and Northern VT.
temperature: Highs in the mid 20s to near 30
